meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Diane Esemplare Thom Page Betsy Knudson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7594.

td.p: Diane Esemplare, an engineer from Riverdale, New Jersey
Thom Page, an OB/GYN doctor from Auburn, Maine
Betsy Knudson, an attorney from Salt Lake City, Utah (whose 2-day cash winnings total $38,601)

tr.td: THE WORLD FACTBOOK SAYS...
THE COLORS OF MUSIC
OTHER HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
"D" IN AMERICAN HISTORY
EXERCISE
SPEAKING GERMAN

tr.td: Betsy
Thom
Diane
WE NEED TO TALK ABOUT KELVIN
ONE-NAMED AUTHORS
OPUS DAY
NOT THEIR FIRST RODEO
DRAMATIC TV DRAMA!
SEE "SPAN"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_3', 'clue_DJ_1_3_stuck', '(Diane: What is a phone line?)
(Alex: No.)
(Diane: Cable? Cable? What is a cable?)
[Originally ruled as spoken after Alex\'s ruling; assessed as spoken before Alex\'s ruling before Final Jeopardy!]
(Betsy: What is a telephone cable?)
[Originally penalized; penalty removed after the ruling on Diane\'s response was reversed]
...
[The end-of-round signal sounds.]

telegraph cable

Diane
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Thom] That was one of the choices they had, but they didn\'t settle on the Badger.)
ThomWhat is The Badger
$5,000
DianeWhat is weasel?
$12,000
BetsyWhat is a Wolverine?
$5,001
Wolverine')

tr.td: COMIC BOOKS
Told to create a character called this, Len Wein learned the real animal is short, hairy & will attack an enemy 10 times its size
Betsy
Thom
Diane
3-day champion: $61,402
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Betsy
Thom
Diane

20 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
